jobActions.name: Hakaze
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 200.
Additional Effect: Increases Kenki Gauge by 5

jobActions.name: Jinpu
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 140.
Combo Action: Gyofu
Combo Potency: 300
Combo Bonus: Grants Fugetsu
Fugetsu Effect: Increases damage dealt by 13%
Duration: 40s
Combo Bonus: Increases Kenki Gauge by 5
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Third Eye
jobActions.description:
Reduces the amount of damage taken by the next attack by 10%.
Duration: 4s
Additional Effect: Increases Kenki Gauge by 10 when hit

jobActions.name: Enpi
jobActions.description:
Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 100.
Enhanced Enpi Bonus Potency: 270
Additional Effect: Increases Kenki Gauge by 10
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Shifu
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 140.
Combo Action: Gyofu
Combo Potency: 300
Combo Bonus: Grants Fuka
Fuka Effect: Reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 13%
Duration: 40s
Combo Bonus: Increases Kenki Gauge by 5
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Fuga
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 90 to all enemies in a cone before you.
Additional Effect: Increases Kenki Gauge by 5

jobActions.name: Gekko
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 160.
210 when executed from a target's rear.
Combo Action: Jinpu
Combo Potency: 370
Rear Combo Potency: 420
Combo Bonus: Increases Kenki Gauge by 10
Combo Bonus: Grants Getsu
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Iaijutsu
jobActions.description:
Executes a weaponskill depending on current number of Sen stored in Sen Gauge.
1 Sen: Higanbana
2 Sen: Tenka Goken
3 Sen: Midare Setsugekka
While under the effect of Tendo, Tenka Goken changes to Tendo Goken, and Midare Setsugekka changes to Tendo Setsugekka.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Mangetsu
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.
Combo Action: Fuko
Combo Potency: 120
Combo Bonus: Grants Fugetsu
Fugetsu Effect: Increases damage dealt by 13%
Duration: 40s
Combo Bonus: Increases Kenki Gauge by 10
Combo Bonus: Grants Getsu

jobActions.name: Kasha
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 160.
210 when executed from a target's flank.
Combo Action: Shifu
Combo Potency: 370
Flank Combo Potency: 420
Combo Bonus: Increases Kenki Gauge by 10
Combo Bonus: Grants Ka
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Oka
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.
Combo Action: Fuko
Combo Potency: 120
Combo Bonus: Grants Fuka
Fuka Effect: Reduces weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay by 13%
Duration: 40s
Combo Bonus: Increases Kenki Gauge by 10
Combo Bonus: Grants Ka

jobActions.name: Yukikaze
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 160.
Combo Action: Gyofu
Combo Potency: 340
Combo Bonus: Increases Kenki Gauge by 15
Combo Bonus: Grants Setsu
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Meikyo Shisui
jobActions.description:
Execute up to 3 weaponskill combos without meeting combo prerequisites. Does not affect Iaijutsu or Ogi Namikiri.
Duration: 20s
Additional Effect: Successfully landing Gekko grants Fugetsu, and successfully landing Kasha grants Fuka
Additional Effect: Grants Tendo
Duration: 30s
Maximum Charges: 2
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Hissatsu: Shinten
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 250.
Kenki Gauge Cost: 25

jobActions.name: Hissatsu: Gyoten
jobActions.description:
Rushes target and delivers an attack with a potency of 100.
Kenki Gauge Cost: 10
Cannot be executed while bound.

jobActions.name: Hissatsu: Yaten
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100.
Additional Effect: 10-yalm backstep
Additional Effect: Grants Enhanced Enpi
Duration: 15s
Kenki Gauge Cost: 10
Cannot be executed while bound.

jobActions.name: Meditate
jobActions.description:
Gradually increases your Kenki Gauge.
Duration: 15s
Additional Effect: Grants stacks of Meditation when used in combat, up to a maximum of 3
Kenki Gauge not affected when used outside battle.
Effect ends upon using another action or moving (including facing a different direction).
Cancels auto-attack upon execution.
Triggers the cooldown of weaponskills upon execution. Cannot be executed during the cooldown of weaponskills.

jobActions.name: Hissatsu: Kyuten
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 120 to all nearby enemies.
Kenki Gauge Cost: 25

jobActions.name: Hagakure
jobActions.description: Converts Setsu, Getsu, and Ka into Kenki. Each Sen converted increases your Kenki Gauge by 10. Can only be executed if under the effect of at least one of the three statuses.

jobActions.name: Ikishoten
jobActions.description:
Increases Kenki Gauge by 50.
Additional Effect: Grants Ogi Namikiri Ready
Duration: 30s
Additional Effect: Grants Zanshin Ready
Duration: 30s
Can only be executed while in combat.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Hissatsu: Guren
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack to all enemies in a straight line before you with a potency of 500 for the first enemy, and 25% less for all remaining enemies.
Kenki Gauge Cost: 25
Shares a recast timer with Hissatsu: Senei.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Hissatsu: Senei
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 800.
Kenki Gauge Cost: 25
Shares a recast timer with Hissatsu: Guren.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Tsubame-gaeshi
jobActions.description:
Repeats the previously executed iaijutsu.
Cannot be used to repeat Higanbana.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Tsubame-gaeshi Ready.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Shoha
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack to all enemies in a straight line before you with a potency of 640 for the first enemy, and 65% less for all remaining enemies.
Can only be executed after accumulating three stacks of Meditation by executing Iaijutsu, Meditate, or Ogi Namikiri while in combat.
Consumes all stacks of Meditation upon execution.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Tengentsu
jobActions.description:
Reduces the amount of damage taken by the next attack by 10%.
Duration: 4s
Additional Effect: Grants Tengentsu's Foresight and increases Kenki Gauge by 10 when hit
Tengentsu's Foresight Effect: Gradually restores your HP and reduces damage taken by 10%
Duration: 9s
Cure Potency: 200

jobActions.name: Fuko
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Increases Kenki Gauge by 10

jobActions.name: Ogi Namikiri
jobActions.description:
Delivers a critical hit to all enemies in a cone before you with a potency of 900 for the first enemy, and 75% less for all remaining enemies.
Damage dealt is increased when under an effect that raises critical hit rate.
Grants a stack of Meditation, up to a maximum of 3.
Can only be executed while under the effect of Ogi Namikiri Ready.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Kaeshi: Namikiri
jobActions.description:
Delivers a critical hit to all enemies in a cone before you with a potency of 900 for the first enemy, and 75% less for all remaining enemies.
Damage dealt is increased when under an effect that raises critical hit rate.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
※Ogi Namikiri changes to Kaeshi: Namikiri when requirements for execution are met.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Gyofu
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 230.
Additional Effect: Increases Kenki Gauge by 5

jobActions.name: Zanshin
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack to all enemies in a cone before you with a potency of 820 for the first enemy, and 60% less for all remaining enemies.
Kenki Gauge Cost: 50
Can only be executed while under the effect of Zanshin Ready.

roleActions.name: Second Wind
roleActions.description:
Instantly restores own HP.
Cure Potency: 800
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

roleActions.name: Bloodbath
roleActions.description:
Converts a portion of physical damage dealt into HP.
Duration: 20s

roleActions.name: Feint
roleActions.description:
Lowers target's physical damage dealt by 10% and magic damage dealt by 5%.
Duration: 15s
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

roleActions.name: Arm's Length
roleActions.description:
Creates a barrier nullifying most knockback and draw-in effects.
Duration: 6s
Additional Effect: Slow +20% when barrier is struck
Duration: 15s

roleActions.name: True North
roleActions.description:
Nullifies all action direction requirements.
Duration: 10s
Maximum Charges: 2

traits.name: Kenki Mastery
traits.description: Increases Kenki Gauge when landing select weaponskills or when taking damage while under the effect of Third Eye.

traits.name: Kenki Mastery II
traits.description: Increases Kenki Gauge when landing all weaponskills excluding Iaijutsu.

traits.name: Way of the Samurai
traits.description: Increases the potency of Hakaze to 200, Jinpu to 120, and Shifu to 120.

traits.name: Enhanced Iaijutsu
traits.description:
Reduces Iaijutsu cast time to 1.3 seconds.
Also grants Tsubame-gaeshi Ready after excecuting iaijutsu excluding Higanbana.
Duration: 30s
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

traits.name: Enhanced Meikyo Shisui
traits.description:
Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Meikyo Shisui.
Maximum Charges: 2
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

traits.name: Enhanced Fugetsu and Fuka
traits.description: Improves Fugetsu's damage increase to 13% and Fuka's reduction to weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay to 13%.

traits.name: Way of the Samurai II
traits.description:
Increases the potency of Gekko, Kasha, and Yukikaze to 110.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

traits.name: Enhanced Ikishoten
traits.description:
Grants Ogi Namikiri Ready upon execution of Ikishoten.
Duration: 30s

traits.name: Enhanced Hissatsu
traits.description: Reduces Hissatsu: Guren and Hissatsu: Senei recast time to 60 seconds.

traits.name: Way of the Samurai III
traits.description: Increases the potency of Jinpu to 140, Shifu to 140, Enhanced Enpi to 270, Gekko to 160, Higanbana damage over time to 50, Kasha to 160, Yukikaze to 160, Midare Setsugekka to 640, Kaeshi: Setsugekka to 640, Shoha to 640, Ogi Namikiri to 900, and Kaeshi: Namikiri to 900.

traits.name: Enhanced Ikishoten II
traits.description:
Grants Zanshin Ready upon executing Ikishoten.
Duration: 30s

traits.name: Enhanced Meikyo Shisui II
traits.description:
Grants Tendo upon executing Meikyo Shisui.
Duration: 30s
Tenka Goken changes to Tendo Goken and Midare Setsugekka changes to Tendo Setsugekka while under the effect of Tendo.
